721450.name: Cardboard Invasion
721450.description:
In a distant land in another dimension where imagination runs wild, there is a war going on. Cardboard Invaders are scheming to take over the happy lands of Cardboard Land.
Cardboard Invasion is a 1-4 player action first-person shooter Tower Defense game for players that love shooting but also strategizing. Players get to play as ex-military cardboard engineers, forced back into battle by an invasion on their homeland. Construct towers to destroy the incoming waves of soldiers, tanks, mechs and more.

KEY FEATURES
Solo Campaign or 2-4 player cooperative gameplay that puts you and your teammates through the ultimate cooperation and communication test.
Explore the cardboard world, built from every day objects we find in our world.

Use the map to plan for the next wave, build and upgrade towers to fit your defensive needs. You will have to work closely with your team mates to survive the incoming waves of attack.
721450.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
